Description: Solid-cast copper alloy figure of the Apis Bull wearing the sun-disc and uraeus; triangle on the forehead; necklet; winged scarab-beetle at the back of the neck; a patterned saddle-cloth; vulture on the rump; two tangs beneath the base.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: Henry Martyn Kennard
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1993-2003, Newcastle, The Hancock Museum, Land of the Pharaohs
Acquisition name: Donated by: Mrs Marion Whiteford Acworth JP
